entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Span overload for SynchronizationContext.Wait(...) #104858
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Remove unneeded comments from API surface area #104846
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Remove `unsafe` from APIs that do not use pointers. #104845
    9.0.0
  • Introducing Environment.ProcessorUserTime & ProcessorPrivilegedTime #104844
    9.0.0

Closed

  • HTTP client metrics: url.scheme should be opt-in, server.port should be required #94829
    9.0.0
  • ICorDebugRegisterSet.GetThreadContext fails on macOS arm64 #104816
    9.0.0
  • Consider adding activities for potentially long running network operations #93832
    9.0.0
  • HTTP/3 Test Failure: SocketsHttpHandler_DiagnosticsTest_Http3.SendAsync_ExpectedDiagnosticCancelledLogging #104699
    9.0.0
  • Intermittent errors building CoreCLR on Windows ARM #104674
    9.0.0
  • Certain build configurations are "less efficient" #76516
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: add ability to do semantic comparisons of JSON values à la JToken.DeepEquals() #33388
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Unnecessary prolog frame setup in .NET 9 #104658
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketOptionNameTest.MulticastInterface_Set_IPv6_XXXXX_Succeeds failing #90491
  • SslStream Custom Algorithm Support #103466

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT: Fix Socket_UDS_Success_ActivityRecorded test #104862
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Issue 104700: Clarify error message for collection property with no getter #104861
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add fedora in install script #104860
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove `GTF_IS_IN_CSE` #104855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [NO REVIEW] Investigating WinHttp issue #104852
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid buffer copying in JSON number equality comparison #104850
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Expose the Sin, Cos, and SinCos methods on the Vector types #104848
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Define equals manually for Swift JitInterface InlineArray types. #104843
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Enable fixed disabled System.Text.Json tests #104771
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • HTTP Metrics: Uncoditionally report server.port #104741
    area-System.Net.Http, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Add toolchain instructions for Fedora #104859
    area-Meta
  • Fix arm64 MacOS and Linux Managed Debugging #104847
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricSelectCoefficient`, `TrigonometricStartingValue` #104681
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddSequentialAcross` #104640
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Remove GTF_BOOLEAN #104779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Add null check in case we can't get H/3 inboundControlStream #104797
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Extend usage of GC_ALLOC_ALIGN8 #104781
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure that the correct VC++ toolset is selected in all build environments #104763
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper code until we know it's needed #104819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Update thread contract doc to align with implementation and other contract docs #104832
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • JIT: Avoid boxing ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull arguments in Tier-0 #104815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2494304 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make it possible to trim custom attribute artifacts #100395
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104818
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.8
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricMultiplyAddCoefficient` #104697
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • SPMI: Add a buffer to `FileWriter` and add a `--parallelism` option to superpmi.py #104789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Throw ObjectDisposedException instead of NullReferenceException #104821
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104837
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104838
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #104541
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, use more precise way to figure how much to pop. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Fix SSP restoring in edge cases #104820
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104829
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • Value num refine phis #104752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make OpenSSL ENGINE support light up #104810
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Container builds: parameter to set container registry for the base image without specifying the exact image name and tag #42140

Closed

  • Dotnet Linux 2.1.300 Arm Big Little Architecture #2324
    Discussion

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update .editorconfig template with new defaults #42059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Let deployment-tools use the VMR commit hash #42139
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE1006: Naming rule violation: Prefix 's_' is not expected after upgrading to .NET 9 SDK #74381
  • Visual Studio 2022 error list doesn't show errors from build failures in Build + Intellisense view #74380

Closed

  • expose "SymbolDisplayCompilerInternalOptions" to public #1891
    Backlog
  • IEventSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences Syntax is VariableDeclaratorSyntax not EventFieldDeclarationSyntax #74379
  • Assert failure in AnalyzerDriver #74315
    17.12 P1
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35112.83 #74377

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert SymbolSearchOptions to editorconfig options #74378
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix debug assert with operation blocks in invalid code #74354
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix interceptors bugs involving ref this parameters #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What should I do to build aspnet offline? #56776
  • Static Readonly Field Value Gets Replaced #56775
  • Exception in browser when navigating to Blazor page running in InteractiveWebAssembly render mode #56774
  • .NET 8 Blazor @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "Admin")] not working #56773
  • [Blazor] Provide a mechanism to pass IConfiguration variables from Server to WASM #56772
  • Expose method for testing for a local URL consumable without depending on MVC #56770
  • Allow Response Caching for Authorized Endpoints #56769

Closed

  • JsonSerializerIsReflectionDisabled exception in Blazor despite using Source Generator. #56752
  • Invalid project created when name has `&` (ampersand) or ` ` (space) in it #56765
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56750
  • Support options for setting callback used to generated reference IDs in OpenAPI #56305
    9.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow Response Caching for Authorized Endpoints #56768
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Set additionalProperties when [JsonExtensionData] is present #56767
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Add support for CreateSchemaReferenceId option #56753
    area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Predicate<Claim>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support debuging windows unpackaged app #23598
  • Collection was modified after the enumerator was instantiated. #23597
  • Media Picker CameraOptions #23596
  • maui workload 8.0.61/8.0.100 introduced NativeAOT runtime error in EFC .net 8 #23595
  • [WiP] Create a path where users can inherit from WrapperView (Also rename WrapperView to MauiPlatformView) #23594

Closed

  • FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync very slow #18199
    Backlog
  • Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22079
    Backlog
  • Crash: Window was already deactivated #22406
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Unable to Navigate Between Entries Using Tab Key #23559

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button

Merged

  • [iOS] Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • Don't throw exceptions on back-to-back window deactivations #23519
    platform/windows 🪟

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Windows] Subscribe pointer events only when needed #23515
    community ✨
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • Make ampersands work *more* in net9-only blazor-solution template #23589
    area-blazor, area-templates
  • Fix iOS log exports #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SqliteConventionSetBuilder.CreateModelBuilder() produces incorrect migrations #34222
  • Missing nuget package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Relational.Specification.Tests #34221
  • [Feature Request] Same filter Includes should result in union include instead of error #34220

Closed

  • Ability to configure DbContextOptionsBuilder via IConfigureOptions/IConfigureNamedOptions #33977
  • Split mappings are not supported for hierarchies #34190

PullRequests

Updated

  • Prefer equality in boolean comparisons #34166
  • Stop including the discriminator in the JSON id by default #34208
  • Avoid duplicating complex expression in comparisons #34172
